Name: Lantern Bearer
About the game: Lantern Bearer is a difficult and atmospheric platformer starring a curious woodland creature.. Highlights Choose your path - Five unique biomes which you can travel between at any time. Fifty hand-crafted levels - Each one is meticulously tuned to be challenging yet fair. Soundtrack - All audio is recorded using actual cave reverb.
